website_summaries.verdict: A play grill, realistic colors and built-in drain holes make this a perfect outdoor playhouse for toddlers and preschoolers.
pros: Finished with real-looking stone and wood finish
Grill,  kitchenette, seat, phone, clock and fireplace
Measure 35"L x 51"W x 46.5"H. Takes 2 AAA batteries (not included)
cons: A little shorter and smaller than other models

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE our Happy Home Cottage!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO glad that we opted to go with this house. It was easy to build and my 15 month old twins love it! The ringing doorbell is absolutely adorable. Step2 never lets me down!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole P

customer_reviews.title: Can take a beating/ Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Get the upgrade. The one with all the little attachments. Have a cordless screwdriver ready. 20 mins to put together. Pretty solid. Have extra batteries for the doorbell. No complaints. "I am the greatest Grandfather in the world" !!! THank you, THank you.
customer_reviews.author: Russell from Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Don’t keep searching!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item! Unique colors, easy to put together, lots of play features. For the price, I don’t think there is another playhouse like this quality and size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but flawed
customer_reviews.text: It took my husband and I about 90 minutes to assemble this playhouse, and we had a drill with a screwdriver bit. Some of the parts fit together well, but others did not. Most of the places where holes needed to be drilled had small indentations indicating where to drill the hole, but a few did not. After we finished assembly by attaching the roof to the top, we noticed that the roof had a large dent on the front (see photo). Since the shipping box was completely undamaged, I think the roof piece was damaged during the manufacturing or packing process and the playhouse was shipped with a defective piece. Overall, I am not satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: abqbev

customer_reviews.title: Pilot holes
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this product came as advertised. It wasn't to hard to assemble although I was very unhappy with the lack of drill holes. I don't believe you should have to "DIY" pilot holes on an already expensive enough product m, especially when there are people out there that don't know how or are just uncomfortable with having to do so. Aside from that this product was well recieved by the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her birthday (she's 2) and she's obsessed with it now! She wants to eat all her meals in it, sleep in it, practically live in it!! The only downfall to this is that the assembly instructions are only pictures, no written instructions and they're a little difficult to follow. But it's relatively self explanatory and the parts that aren't that clear are easy enough to figure out with a quick Google search!
customer_reviews.author: broocksie

customer_reviews.title: Noah’s ark, it is not
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter really enjoys her house and she’s able to put her little kitchen in there and have a blast. The thing I’m hugely disappointed about and gave it three stars for is that holds water like a sinking boat. this model Playhouse has a floor and I probably would not have ordered it if I had known that. But you have to pretty much pick up the entire house and dump it out or drill huge holes in the floor because the holes that they drilled aren’t sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I bought this playhouse for my daughter to have something to play with outside. I (single mom) put it together in about 45 minutes and the instructions were easy to follow. I would recommend a cordless screwdriver/drill though and also pre-drilling the holes really sped things up. I also drilled a few holes in the bottom for drainage.
customer_reviews.author: Aratay

customer_reviews.title: Cute but fills with water when it rains.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute; my 18- month old grandson loved it. BUT, when it rained the side supports filled halfway up with water. Also, the bottom filled with water and there is no drain for either area—TERRIBLE DESIGN!! I’m returning this because I’m concerned about mold forming in the walls. STEP2, step up your game!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jody@San Juan Capistrano

customer_reviews.title: Good for little ones.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little playhouse. I bought it for my 18 month old, but my 6 year old enjoys using it also. I like that it’s open and not super enclosed which keeps it cooler in the summer and keeps spiders and other bugs from taking up residence.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Step 2 products are always great
customer_reviews.text: In a family of three, the two older grandchildren had enjoyed an outdoor playhouse similar to this one; however, they had outgrown it. so I was glad to find this one for the two year old. On the day their Dad put it together all three of the children were in the house - ages 8, 6, and 2! So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: srwalrath

customer_reviews.title: Fun, sturdy, and easy to put together!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this little cottage! Perfect for my two year old son to play in and pretend. Love all of the imaginative elements such as the sink, window shutters, seat, door bell, mail slot etc!! Super easy to assemble as well! Good, sturdy quality! Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Hepburn & Chelsea Hepburn

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Fun! Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: What a great item! My 2 1/2 year old loves this! Doorbell works and it was easy 30 minute set up! Bright vibrant colors but still blends with the yard so its not an eyesore. Spacious for multiple kids to play but still a small footprint that it doesn't take up our entire yard! Highly Recommend, couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received different color than shown
customer_reviews.text: Received a different color than shown which I was not a fan of... I picked this one so it could match the slide pictured with it.. however it is still a nice playhouse and my daughter still loved it... easy to put together just make sure you have a drill
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: It’s nicer in person than I expected. It’s not flimsy , like other outdoor play houses , so i feel safe with a toddler playing in it. Added bonus - drain holes so you don’t have to worry if it rains.
customer_reviews.author: SLB

customer_reviews.title: Beware, what you get may not be what is shown
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as pictured with green door and shutters. Received red door with red shutters and this thing will be a nuisance to return. Not pleased at all.
customer_reviews.author: AmznJunkieX

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: Cute and fun for my four year old. Wish I had bought it when she was younger though because she’s getting a little tall for it. Only thing I dislike is that the grill is hardly attached and falls off easily.
customer_reviews.author: J2MRIG

customer_reviews.title: Some manufacturing flaws, but sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Screws were a little difficult to insert without premade holes, so we had to use a drill. Also, there are no drainage holes in the bottom, which means there’s lots of standing water in it every time it rains. The lip on the floor at the entryway makes it really difficult to pour out. Pros: sturdy and durable. My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love It
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't too hard to put together and the kids have loved it more than the similar sized one I bought that has a slide. Also, projecting a bit, but i have seen multiple versions of these around my neighborhood at houses where the kids have aged out, so guessing it will get more than the necessary mileage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 and 4 year old love this. It was easy to put together by myself. It’s very durable (has to be with my boys). My oldest thinks he is a little hulk and flips it over and climbs on it and it’s held up very well. They love to play inside and conspire against mommy.
customer_reviews.author: Boymom2

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Came about a week before it said so that was nice easy to put together but none of the screw holes were punched in so I couldn’t screw it in right away until someone cut them open.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Marker

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: The toy is fine, my son likes it but it is NOT easy together. Took hours and back strength to literally push the screw through the Material to make a hole as there is no hole premAde. I had to use a drill as well as it would have taken much longer
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: kids will love
customer_reviews.text: i have a 2 year old grandson and he is in this everyday,using his imagination and serving you food, really loves it, great purchase and worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Joy Kramer

customer_reviews.title: grandchildren love.
customer_reviews.text: bought two of these for grandchildren - they love them, and their dads said they had all the parts and were no trouble to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Nice !!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 and 2 yr olds love this . They are boys so very durable so far.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My youngest grandson loves this little cottage. Be warned, the other grandchildren like it too so it gets crowded inside!
customer_reviews.author: OmaKendrick

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great for small kids
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase have had outside over a month and through a heavy heavy storm and still perfect. Recommend making the water drain holes a little bigger besides that it's great bought for my almost 2 yr old and he loves it and going in everyday
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It took about an hour to put together...and make sure you use an electric screwdriver or it will be frustrating. Instructions were easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Smith

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: Our son could not stop playing in his house. He practically sleeps in it. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Warriorsden559

customer_reviews.title: Grandson's playhouse
customer_reviews.text: He absolutely loves this playhouse and was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Easy to assemble. disappointed the clock was paper sticker and the mail slot is too small for regular envelopes. Otherwise - its a winner!
customer_reviews.author: ams

customer_reviews.title: instructions
customer_reviews.text: I didn't receive the decals which is an important part of this dollhouse. I also didn't receive any instructions on how to put it together. For almost $300.00 those things should have been included. I asked for them to be sent to me and they said they couldn't.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Duensing

customer_reviews.title: Great little play house
customer_reviews.text: Great little play house! Fair price. Good size and daughter loves I️t. She is 3’ 3” and has room to grow and play comfortably in there so I know we will have it a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my granddaughter. Easy to put together and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: motherhen

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, that’s what’s important right?
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it, easy enough to put together by myself. The top doesn’t fit as it should on the walls, maybe the molding is off but none the less it is 85-90% squared and sturdy enough for 2 & 3 year olds to play in.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Clay

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, and very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great Little House!!..,with all the tips and clips!!....easy assembly.....Would recommend............Good Value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Carol H.

customer_reviews.title: This comes in a huge box and is difficult to maneuver.  It is very small.
customer_reviews.text: Meant for very small children, Almost impossible to return and then there are outrageous shipping charges!
customer_reviews.author: Geri H Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids love this little cottage!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for kids and easy to assemble. You do need an electric drill! Grandkids just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica T

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. No “bells and whistles” but it has plenty of room to put toys in and still play.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: my daughter was so excited!! great Christmas present. easy to assemble. She loves playing in the cottage
customer_reviews.author: Katey Safrin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Product as shown, my two year old loves it. Pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.author: PepC Face

customer_reviews.title: Great little playhouse
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love it, it’s a good size for a smaller patio or yard. It’s a smaller type house though so if you have a big space u may want a bigger playhouse.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Casey

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Arrive a week early, on Easter Sunday! It was a great surprise for my 3yr old twins. We had a huge rain/wind storm the next day, and the house did not budge! Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 and 1 year old are obsessed with this play house! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: durable, cute and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Got this for twins first birthday gift. Twins and 3 Yr old love it! summers worth of play so far. great value!
customer_reviews.author: Richie Rich

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and all the little things that make a house a home.
customer_reviews.author: dawn talwar

customer_reviews.title: Great house
customer_reviews.text: This is the best house for little kids. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: T. Kayton

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this was purchased for our 2 yo grandson and he loves it. Easy tp assemble, the floor is very nice so he won't stand in mud after a rain. He particularly loves the doorbell and all the doors and windows. It fits nicely on their small deck so it's easy to supervise
customer_reviews.author: Carol Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Grand kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Received by date promised. The door bell rings, grandkids like that. Went to together okay, wasn’t difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Jurentkuff

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Kids like it (5 and 1.5) but from the picture and video it looked bigger...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not the same as the picture
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, but wrong colors. They sent us one with all difderent colors then shown. Still is cute though, and my 2 year old loves it. Very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Dasaro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome playhouse
customer_reviews.text: Awesome playhouse. Just the right side for my little one. When putting it together there were no holes so we had to put holes in to put the screws in. Other than that it was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Shea Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor play.
customer_reviews.text: Our grandkids love this house! Time will tell how sturdy it is, but we've decided to add a screw to attach the doorbell post to the roof. Without the extra screw, the post wiggles a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great playhouse
customer_reviews.text: This playhouse is awesome! My kids love it. They are aged 2-4..however, their older cousins play in it with them often as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Compton

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, goes faster if you have a drill.
customer_reviews.author: Kenan

customer_reviews.title: Water does not drain
customer_reviews.text: Water does not drain. No way to hose and clean the mud in the floor.
customer_reviews.author: David Kong

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her play house and I love the easy assembly and durability
customer_reviews.author: cynthia n. schrimper

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy playhouse!
customer_reviews.text: Durable playhouse that can hold up against a rough toddler. My son loves this house!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Bazigos

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together. It had a floor to it, which I can’t decide if I like or not. Giving 4 stars because the directions were pretty poor...
customer_reviews.author: apap1027

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it! It was simple to put together in less than an hour
customer_reviews.author: Lester Epperson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 3 year old Grandson and he loves it. It was easy to put together and is very sturdy. He plays with it several hours daily.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Zentner

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great size not too big not too small
customer_reviews.text: Great play noise the door bell is a big hit. Easy to install and a good size not too big or small
customer_reviews.author: zolkie58

customer_reviews.title: Floor drainage
customer_reviews.text: The floor doesn’t drain as well as it was described. Otherwise. Great playhouse
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and my son can easily move it around the yard.
customer_reviews.author: William Greer

customer_reviews.title: It's new and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Everything was in order all pieces where inside the box it was new
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan lizarraga

customer_reviews.title: Water is getting in the panel where the window shutter ...
customer_reviews.text: Water is getting in the panel where the window shutter are. Since this is a solid piece this should not happen.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN FITZPATRICK

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson to play in outside in his yard. It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nella Ivie

customer_reviews.title: We love the playhouse for our grandson but when it arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: We love the playhouse for our grandson but when it arrived the box had been opened on both ends and the assembly instructions were missing
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L Edgell

customer_reviews.title: kids love it
customer_reviews.text: fun house and kids love it. They are 2 and 1.
customer_reviews.author: wmw

customer_reviews.title: Great playhouse with built in seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute playhouse. As other reviewers mentioned, one of the great features is the built in seat. My toddler son always heads straight for the seat. The working doorbell is fun and I think the grill will be a hit as he gets older. The floor was a must have for me but sometimes the water does not drain as fast as I would like to. My husband just tips it over if necessary. We're really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Lfc 19

product_meta.title: Step2 Happy Home Cottage & Grill Kids Playhouse, Blue
product_meta.description: There’s a very good reason why Step2 named this popular kitchen playset the Happy Home Cottage & Grill. It makes kids really, really HAPPY! As in giggly, silly, jumping-up-and-down, can’t-contain-themselves happy. The secret is in the many cool features it has that a lot of other play kitchens don’t. Things like a built-in mailbox, chiming doorbell, play phone, wall clock, flower box, swinging dutch-style door, working shutters, hardwood-looking floor (with drain holes), fireplace, kitchen seat, sink, and toy grill. All absolutely necessary for great pretend play, of course. So, if you’re looking for a kids kitchen set with a kids grill that’s beyond fun, this is the one! Made in the U.S.A. of U.S. and imported parts. Adult assembly required. Self-Service is available for titles, product descriptions, bullet features and search terms. You can access self-service features on Vendor Central by going to Items > Edit Products.
feature_bullets: Large, open concept playhouse allows for mom or dad to keep a watchful eye!
Playhouse features a working doorbell, dutch-style door and a fun pass-through mail slot
Kids playhouse features a built-in floor (with drain holes) to help keep little ones clean and the mud out!
Interior features a kitchenette, kitchen seat, fireplace, wall clock and fun play phone!
Charming home design features realistic stone molding and wood finishing

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars318 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
